our-team.title: Our Team
our-team.description: Meet the team that makes it all happen.

members.name: Olivier
members.bio: Started coding since 13 years old in back-end development, then moved to front-end with Angular + Typescript. He is now a full-stack developer. Responsible for designing and developing the company's virtual products.

members.name: David
members.bio: Jane is the CTO of our company. She has a background in computer science and has been with the company for 5 years. She is responsible for overseeing the company's technical operations and ensuring that our products are of the highest quality.

members.name: Samuel
members.bio: Alice is the COO of our company. She has a background in operations and has been with the company for 3 years. She is responsible for overseeing the company's day-to-day operations and ensuring that everything runs smoothly.

members.name: Simon
members.bio: Bob is the CMO of our company. He has a background in marketing and has been with the company for 4 years. He is responsible for overseeing the company's marketing efforts and ensuring that our products reach the right audience.
